document_data.caption: A map showing the Shaareach Forest south of the Shaareach.
document_data.name: Shaareach Forest
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shaareach Forest''' was a small forest found in the southern [[Shaar]] near the border of [[Lapaliiya]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Geography: The forest was located in between the [[Channathwood]] in the east and the [[Misty Vale (forest)|Misty Vale]] in the west. It was bordered to the north by the plains of the [[Shaareach]] and to the south by the [[River Channath]] and [[River Talar]]. The [[River Shaar]] flowed through the middles of the Shaareach Forest.
